arts.ttl: Lionel Messi blames pitch for Argentina's frustrating draw with Venezuela
arts.sum: Lionel Messi and Lionel Scaloni criticise the pitch after Argentina are held to a 1-1 draw in Thursday's World Cup qualifying clash against Venezuela.

arts.ttl: Brazil hero Igor Jesus, Argentina's Nico Paz lead list of international debutants
arts.sum: As a new cycle begins, international coaches are looking to reward players who are hitting top form. Here, we take a look at some of the players chosen for the first time.

arts.ttl: Messi: Soaked pitch led to 'ugly' Venezuela draw
arts.sum: Lionel Messi blamed the conditions of the pitch Estadio Monumental de Maturín for Argentina's "ugly' 1-1 draw against Venezuela on Thursday night in their first World Cup qualifier of the October international window.

arts.ttl: Argentina held by Venezuela on rain-soaked pitch
arts.sum: Argentina were held to a 1-1 draw against Venezuela on Thursday in Lionel Messi's return to international duty in the South America's World Cup qualifiers.

arts.ttl: Brazil has away win over Chile in World Cup qualifying and Messi's Argentina draws
arts.sum: An 89th-minute goal by substitute Luiz Henrique gave Brazil a 2-1 away win over Chile on Thursday in a 2026 World Cup qualifying match. The win meant under-pressure Brazil coach Dorival Júnior’s team will finish the ninth round of the round-robin competition in fourth place in South American qualifying.

arts.ttl: Argentina team news: Why isn’t Emiliano Martínez playing against Venezuela?
arts.sum: Argentina team news to face Venezuela Lionel Scaloni’s team have won six of their opening eight games of this qualification cycle, enough for them to top the CONMEBOL group.

arts.ttl: Argentina arrive in Venezuela after Hurricane Milton scare, as Brazil need upturn in form
arts.sum: With Lionel Messi back after missing the previous two games through injury, Argentina will be hoping to put their defeat to Colombia behind them and get back to winning ways on Thursday when they take on Venezuela away in the ninth game of South American World Cup 2026 qualifying. Venezuela, the only South American team never to have played in a World Cup, is in sixth place with 10 points on its tally, similar to fifth-placed Brazil, which has a better goal difference.

arts.ttl: When is Venezuela vs Argentina? Times, how to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: The CONMEBOL World Cup 2026 qualifier between Venezuela and Argentina will be played on Thursday October 10, 2024, with kick-off at 5:00 p.m. ET / 2:00 p.m. PT . We’re on the cusp of the midway stage in CONMEBOL’s World Cup qualifying competition, with six guaranteed spots at the 2026 finals up for grabs, and the seventh-placed side heading into an intercontinental play-off.

arts.ttl: Argentina manager reignites Alexis Mac Allister injury fears
arts.sum: Liverpool midfielder Alexis Mac Allister is a fresh injury concern after Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni admitted the player has been training separately since reporting for international duty. "Alexis is training [separately]," the coach explained.

arts.ttl: ‘He gives more effort for Argentina…’ – Diego Simeone slams Rodrigo de Paul’s Atlético Madrid form
arts.sum: Diego Simeone is never a manager to back away from confrontation, even if it’s with his own players. If the Argentinian coach thinks you aren’t playing well enough he will…
